'''Meikyou Shisui Art''' is a sword art of Inazuma, mentioned in [[A Swordmaster's Path Is Paved With Broken Blades]].

==Known Members==
* [[Domon]]
* [[Nanako]]
* [[Junya]]

===Former===
* [[Anzai]]
* Two [[Kairagi]] in [[Tatarasuna]]<ref>Bounty, Eyewitness Report: [[Bounties/List#Inazuma|Inazuma]]</ref>
* [[Katou Shingo]]

==Story==
Anzai was senior to Domon in the dojo. However, Domon defeated Anzai and the previous dojo master to become the new master of the Meikyou Shisui Art. Domon strived to become the best swordsmaster in the world, but one day had his [[Vision]] taken away due to the [[Vision Hunt Decree]], making him suffer a spiritual collapse.

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|{{wt|明鏡止水|''Meikyou shisui''}}|ja=明鏡止水|ja_tl=clear mirror, still water}} is a Japanese proverb that describes a calm and clear state of mind.
